Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function($) {
  $('#form').submit(function() {
    $.pub('RPC', this.message.value);
    return false;
  });
});
</script>
<style type="text/css">
<!--

body {
  font-family: Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
  font-size: .8em;
  margin: 5px;
}

-->
</style>
<form id="form">
<input name="message" type="text" />
<input type="submit" />
</form>
